body_html:
Thank you @deepali-c! Very much appreciate you taking time to help. I tried out your suggestion .....

$ sudo cp /usr/lib/nvidia-396/libnvidia-fatbinaryloader.so.396.44 /usr/local/cuda-9.2/lib64/
$ ./tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack --use-mkldnn nccl caffe2 libshm gloo THD c10d

OUTPUT

-- Found a library with BLAS API (mkl).
-- Found a library with LAPACK API. (mkl)
-- Found CUDA: /usr/local/cuda-9.2 (found suitable version "9.2", minimum required is "5.5")
-- CuDNN not found. Compiling without CuDNN support
disabling ROCM because NOT USE_ROCM is set
-- MIOpen not found. Compiling without MIOpen support
-- Could NOT find MKLDNN (missing: MKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR MKLDNN_LIBRARY)
-- MKLDNN not found. Compiling without MKLDNN support
-- GCC 5.4.0: Adding gcc and gcc_s libs to link line
CMake Error at third_party/sleef/CMakeLists.txt:27 (message):
SLEEF does not allow in-source builds.

You can refer to doc/build-with-cmake.md for instructions on how provide a
separate build directory. Note: Please remove autogenerated file
CMakeCache.txt and directory CMakeFiles in the current directory.

-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/media/nick/Windows/Development/workspaces/pytorch/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
See also "/media/nick/Windows/Development/workspaces/pytorch/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log".

body:
Thank you @deepali-c! Very much appreciate you taking time to help. I tried out your suggestion .....

$ sudo cp /usr/lib/nvidia-396/libnvidia-fatbinaryloader.so.396.44 /usr/local/cuda-9.2/lib64/
$ ./tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack --use-mkldnn nccl caffe2 libshm gloo THD c10d

OUTPUT

-- Found a library with BLAS API (mkl).
-- Found a library with LAPACK API. (mkl)
-- Found CUDA: /usr/local/cuda-9.2 (found suitable version "9.2", minimum required is "5.5") 
-- CuDNN not found. Compiling without CuDNN support
disabling ROCM because NOT USE_ROCM is set
-- MIOpen not found. Compiling without MIOpen support
-- Could NOT find MKLDNN (missing: MKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR MKLDNN_LIBRARY) 
-- MKLDNN not found. Compiling without MKLDNN support
-- GCC 5.4.0: Adding gcc and gcc_s libs to link line
CMake Error at third_party/sleef/CMakeLists.txt:27 (message):
  SLEEF does not allow in-source builds.

  You can refer to doc/build-with-cmake.md for instructions on how provide a
  separate build directory.  Note: Please remove autogenerated file
  `CMakeCache.txt` and directory `CMakeFiles` in the current directory.


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/media/nick/Windows/Development/workspaces/pytorch/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
See also "/media/nick/Windows/Development/workspaces/pytorch/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log".
